content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Good to meet you, Hassan. Thank you for showing interest in my apartment. Based on the location and size of the apartment, I was thinking a monthly rental price of 800 Euros. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
TERMINATE
I am not interested in the rental price you propose. I would like to see other apartments in the area. Thank you for your time.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: I'm sorry to hear that you're not interested in my apartment. If you have any other questions or if there's anything else I can help you with, please don't hesitate to ask.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
TERMINATE
I am not interested in seeing any other apartments in the area. Thank you for your time.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: No problem, Hassan. I understand if you're not interested in my apartment. If you have any other questions or if you change your mind in the future, feel free to reach out to me. Have a great day!
name: Heinrich Heine
